Prayers on Content (IMPORTANT! Go to config to perform a save to preserve your preference in db and Please view Post Install Configuration)
See readme.txt for more detail

queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__content_mosprayer_config` ( `id` int(10) unsigned zerofill NOT NULL auto_increment, `admin_email` varchar(63) NOT NULL default 'changeme@mail.com', `excl_sec` varchar(63) NOT NULL default '0', `excl_contents` varchar(63) NOT NULL default '0', `per_page` varchar(2) NOT NULL default '15', `donated` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '0', `email_alerts` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '1', `email_alerts_user` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '0', `review` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '1', `regonly` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '1', `updates` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '0', `force_preview` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '1', `hide_comments` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '0', `hide_url` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '0', `email_req` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '1', `new_1st` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '1', `form_above` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '0', `use_divcss` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '1', `use_username` varchar(1) NOT NULL default '0', KEY `id` (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__content_mosprayer_requests` ( `articleid` int(11) NOT NULL default 0, `id` int(10) unsigned zerofill NOT NULL auto_increment, `entry` text NOT NULL, `name` text NOT NULL, `email` varchar(63) NOT NULL default '', `homepage` varchar(63) NOT NULL default '', `date` varchar(20) NOT NULL default '', `time` varchar(5) NOT NULL default '', `published` char(1) NOT NULL default '0', `ip` char(15) NOT NULL default '', KEY `id` (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM
